sourcesContent:
import React,{useState,useContext} from 'react' import { CartContext } from '../Global/CartContext' import {jsPDF} from 'jspdf' import logo from '../images/achar.jpeg' const Cart = () => { const {shopingCart,totalPrice,qty,dispatch} =useContext(CartContext); const pdfGenerate=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); var doc = new jsPDF('landscape','px','a4','false'); doc.addImage(logo,'PNG',65,20,500,400) doc.addPage() doc.setFont('Helvertica','bold') doc.number(60,60,{totalPrice}) doc.save('b.pdf') } return ( <>
{shopingCart.length > 0 ? shopingCart.map(cart=>(
{cart.name} {cart.price} dispatch({type:'INC',id:cart.id,cart})}> {cart.qty} dispatch({type:'DIC',id:cart.id,cart})}> {cart.price*cart.qty} dispatch({type:'DELETE',id:cart.id,cart})}>
)) :"Sorry the cart is empty..."}
{shopingCart.length > 0 ?

Cart Summary

Total Items
{qty}
Total price
{totalPrice}

: ''}
) } export default Cart;
